com.upsight.android.marketing.internal.billboard

Class BillboardFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • android.app.DialogFragment
        • com.upsight.android.marketing.internal.billboard.BillboardFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.content.DialogInterface.OnCancelListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnDismissListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public final class BillboardFragment
extends android.app.DialogFragment
    A DialogFragment-based container for a content view. This is used for full-screen, dialog and embedded display of content views.

    See UpsightBillboardHandlers.

      • getContentViewContainer

        public android.view.ViewGroup getContentViewContainer()
        Gets the container view for the content view of the Billboard. This can be called anytime, regardless of whether the fragment is attached to a Activity or where it is in its lifecycle.
        Returns:
        The container view.
